text: Amden is a municipality in See-Gaster, in the canton of St. Gallen in Switzerland. == Geography == Amden has an area of . It is on a terrace above the north shore of the Lake Walen. The Seerenbach Falls is in Amden. It is the highest waterfall in Switzerland. == References == == Other websites == * Amden - Official website * Amden - Official website * Category:Municipalities in See-Gaster Category:Ski areas and resorts in Switzerland
title: Amden
